website_summaries.verdict: Two dishes for the price of one that work for home and commercial use.
pros: Great for all food from cooked fish to small appetizers
Easy to stack, serve, wash, and do all over again
cons: A little too small for some

customer_reviews.title: Necessary dish for your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love love love them!! I had "Poor Mans Lobster" in a dish like this and it kept it so hot while you were eating I ordered them!! They keep everything hot! Any sidedish, anything!! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Megala

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love these! Multi-purpose use!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Perfect for a party to hold nuts, grapes, cheese etc or you could place potpourri with candles in them.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A

customer_reviews.title: Great for baked fish
customer_reviews.text: Love to bake fish in these - but don't let them overlook! Plan to eat shortly after baking - excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T. Heider

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: They are well made and of good quality, but for what I was wanting I should have ordered the larger 20%
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Handier than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.text: I like using this pair of SS Serving dishes as a base to put my pastry dough in and fill before i pull the edges together to seal the filling in. I also use these to back the pastry with the filling and they work out great... I use parchment paper underneath the dough to keep if from sticking. Suits my needs very well. Only caution is that the edges can be a little rough but nothing that a bit of sanding or a file can handle quickly
customer_reviews.author: Manny Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of cooking my fish in a pie pan. This presentation, and way of cooking is much better. Holds the Butter and Wine close to my fish. and its just delish.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Tellez

customer_reviews.title: Great for broiler
customer_reviews.text: I have used them for my Veracruz style Red Snapper recipe and they were the perfect size. Can't wait to try them for other recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lee

customer_reviews.title: KEEPS FOOD HOT
customer_reviews.text: NICE LOOK AND SIZE TO THEM,USED THEM FOR SAUTE SCALLPS AND STEAK ALREADY
customer_reviews.author: SHADOW WITT

customer_reviews.title: Ideal utensil.
customer_reviews.text: Needed some of these for a seafood dish I wanted to prepare. Great for individual servings.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: They appear to be a good product. One arrived with a blemish on the ...
customer_reviews.text: They appear to be a good product. One arrived with a blemish on the bottom that I can live with and that is why I only gave it a 3 star rating. In my judgement, this product blemished before it shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Snoberger

customer_reviews.title: but they do a great job in the oven to make baked pastas
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner than I thought, but they do a great job in the oven to make baked pastas.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Mejia

product_meta.title: 15 oz. (Ounce) Stainless Steel Oval Au Gratin Serving Dish Pan Platter - Set of 2
product_meta.description:
Perfect both restaurant and home kitchen, this versatile French style au gratin dish is great for baking individual casseroles and works well with oven cooked foods such as meats, capturing all cooked juices nicely.

This dishes are made of quality stainless steel with a polished shine finish, features a flat set rim for baking crumbs, layered cheese or dough crusts, are oven safe for varying temperatures and are dishwasher safe as well.

DIMENSIONS:
Volume - 15 Ounces
Length - 9 5/8 Inches
Width - 5 Inches
Height - 1 1/4 Inches
feature_bullets: Price reflects 2 dish pans per order
DIMENSIONS: Volume - 15 Ounces, Length - 9 5/8 Inches, Width - 5 Inches, Height - 1 1/4 Inches
